programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When a missing M16 officer is linked to the death of a petty officer, Gibbs sends Quinn and Bishop to investigate; Quinn recounts a painful ordeal that caused her to leave field work.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When a kidnapped officer escapes her captor, the team discovers a strange connection to her missing husband; Abby knits gifts for the new members of NCIS.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Torres breaks protocol when he learns that a witness in an NCIS case is wanted by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement; Abby, Bishop and McGee try to woo Tony DiNozzo Sr. to sublet Tony's old apartment.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Agent Bishop questions her previous work at the NSA after being sent to Gitmo to gather evidence for a Navy chaplain murder case; Bishop's brothers visit for Thanksgiving.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team looks into a series of threats against congresswoman Jenna Flemming; Director Vance takes charge of temporary protection detail.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Evidence from the murder of a Navy captain leads the NCIS team to Ducky's deceased mother; the team exchanges holiday gifts; Gibbs has Christmas dinner with Fornell.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Sue must determine whether a deaf sculptor committed a murder; Bobby and Myles have trouble escorting two federal witnesses out of town.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: An investigation into the suspected hazing murder of a senator's son exposes a terrorist murder plot.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: The team searches for a stranger who delivered a photo memory stick to the FBI; Myles campaigns for a vacant city council seat.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: A friend from Bull's past enlists his services to help convince a jury that a domestic abuse survivor who shot her husband in his sleep is not guilty of murder because she feared for her life and the life of her unborn child.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull's team takes on a seemingly unwinnable case; a mute man faces the death penalty if he's found guilty of murder and arson; Bull is stunned to learn that his ex-wife is remarrying.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull's team is rocked when a client is found guilty of murder; the team finds new evidence but must find a way to present it in court without being found in contempt; Marissa faces hard truths about her relationship with Bull.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull returns to work with a new rich client for the firm to represent: an insurance company being sued by a dying mother for denying coverage of her liver transplant.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull finds himself serving jury duty while simultaneously mounting a defense for a woman on trial for killing her daughter's murderer.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: J.J. is shaken after investigating the case of two abducted children, and tells her husband about the events.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: As the BAU welcomes back Emily Prentiss, they're called upon to investigate the disappearance of three women.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team searches for a serial killer along the Appalachian Trail in rural Virginia.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU investigates the case of two murdered families, where two high school students are the sole survivors.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Three children vanish while riding their bikes on the same path where a similar unsolved disappearance took place 30 years earlier.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A man who believes himself to be the brother of Dr. Tara Lewis arrives in town, knowing everything about Tara's family; Tara is unable to make contact with her real brother.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU team investigates when the remains of a dozen people are discovered along a creek bed in Yakima, Wash.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: While conducting a profiling course on his birthday, Rossi gets a call from serial killer Tommy Yates, who gives him the location of his latest victim.

programme.desc: Maggie and Dana struggle to find justice for victims murdered by a serial killer; the mayor limits the investigation to cut costs.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: OA and Maggie team up with members of the FBI's Fugitives Department to track down a person wanted for murder who is also on America's Top 10 Most Wanted list.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: The team must take down a dangerous drug ring after an American diplomat is killed while being used as a pawn; Jubal and OA try to help friends from their past fight off their inner demons.
